channel.title: STAT 575 - Computational Statistics - SIUe - Summer 2021 on metafunctor
channel.description: Recent content in STAT 575 - Computational Statistics - SIUe - Summer 2021 on metafunctor

item.title: Computational Statistics - SIUe - STAT 575 - Problem Set 2
item.description: This problem set covers the E-M algorithm for right-censored normal data with known variance.

item.title: SIUe - Computational Statistics (STAT 575) - Problem Set 4
item.description: This problem set covers sampling from a Gamma distribution using Metropolis-Hastings and acceptance-rejection methods.

item.title: Computational Statistics - SIUe - STAT 575 - Exam 1
item.description: This exam covers accept-reject algorithms, the EM algorithm, and the MLE of a truncated normal distribution.

item.title: Computational Statistics - SIUe - STAT 575 - Exam 1
item.description: This exam covers numerical integration, Monte Carlo simulation, acceptance-rejection sampling, importance sampling, and the Metropolis-Hastings algorithm.

item.title: Computational Statistics - SIUe - STAT 575 - Problem Set 3
item.description: This problem set covers numerical integration, Riemann sums, Gauss-Hermite quadrature, Monte Carlo simulation, and Gaussian mixture models.

item.title: Computational Statistics - SIUe - STAT 575 - Problem Set 1
item.description: This problem set contains solutions to problems involving Newton’s method, the secant method, Poisson regression, and various sampling techniques.
